attributes.action: make a standard age limit to define an adult from a child.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If I were to buy a pint of beer in a pub, I would have to be an 'adult' -18 years old. However, if I wished to travel on the train, I would have to buy an 'adult' ticket at 16 years old. Why is there a difference in the ages to classify an 'adult'?
